(1) Hunting
(2) Foraging 
Walk around the jungle along the water.
You canâ€™t risk going through the jungle without a guide, you have to go around. 
The food runs out after 5 days, but fortunately the jungle provides enough fruits. 
After 3 difficult weeks you finally reach Hyghel.
There you are welcomed, and you quickly befriend the townsfolk. They teach you how to survive in the woods on your own. 
>> What do you learn about?
